resources.string: Doesn’t have an account yet? \nPlease Sign Up to enjoy our services!
Sistem sedang sibuk atau terdapat ketidaksesuaian format, silahkan coba verifikasi kembali.
Pengguna tidak diautentikasi, silakan masuk lagi!
Halaman tidak ditemukan, silakan coba lagi nanti!
Metode tidak diizinkan, silakan coba lagi nanti!
Tidak dapat memproses permintaan Anda, silakan hubungi administrator!
Server sedang dalam pemeliharaan, silakan hubungi administrator!
Tidak dapat terhubung ke server, periksa koneksi internet Anda!
Terjadi kesalahan respons dari server, silakan hubungi administrator!
Ensure your face is within the frame
Please do not use sunglasses and/or a medical mask
Your personal data is guaranteed safe and used only for verification purposes
We are sorry, we couldn’t verify your account. Please visit the nearest branch to open TrustLink Bank Account
Thank you, your account is successfully verified!

string-array.name: attention_list
string-array.item: The eKTP is real, not a photocopy
The eKTP is not blurred and/or cropped
The photo taken/uploaded is a eKTP, not other document
The photo brightness and/or contrast are in ideal condition

string-array.name: failed_list
string-array.item: Do not use sunglasses and/or a medical mask
No multiple faces within the frame
Face not too far/too close to the camera
